verses.verse: <S%H2009>Behold,<s%> the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H935>comes,<s%> and your <S%H7998>spoil<s%> shall be <S%H2505>divided<s%> in the <S%H7130>middle<s%> of you.

For I will <S%H622>gather<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> <S%H413>against<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H4421>battle;<s%> and the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall be <S%H3947>taken,<s%> and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> <S%H8155>rifled,<s%> and the <S%H802>women<s%> <S%H7693>ravished;<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H5892>city<s%> shall <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> into <S%H1473>captivity,<s%> and the <S%H3499>residue<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall not be <S%H3772>cut<s%> off from the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

Then shall the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H3318>go<s%> <S%H3318>forth,<s%> and <S%H3898>fight<s%> against <S%H1992>those<s%> <S%H1471>nations,<s%> as <S%H3117>when<s%> he <S%H3898>fought<s%> in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of <S%H7128>battle.<s%>

And his <S%H7272>feet<s%> shall <S%H5975>stand<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%> on the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H2132>Olives,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> is <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> on the <S%H6924>east,<s%> and the <S%H2022>mount<s%> of <S%H2132>Olives<s%> shall <S%H1234>split<s%> in the <S%H2677>middle<s%> thereof toward the <S%H4217>east<s%> and toward the <S%H3220>west,<s%> and there shall be a <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H1516>valley;<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> shall <S%H4185>remove<s%> toward the <S%H6828>north,<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> of it toward the <S%H5045>south.<s%>

And you shall <S%H5127>flee<s%> to the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains;<s%> for the <S%H1516>valley<s%> of the <S%H2022>mountains<s%> shall <S%H5060>reach<s%> to <S%H682>Azal:<s%> yes, you shall <S%H5127>flee,<s%> like as you <S%H5127>fled<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H7494>earthquake<s%> in the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H5818>Uzziah<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah:<s%> and the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> my <S%H430>God<s%> shall <S%H935>come,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H6918>saints<s%> with you.
And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> that the <S%H216>light<s%> shall not be <S%H3368>clear,<s%> nor <S%H7087>dark:<s%>

But it shall be <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3117>day<s%> <S%H1931>which<s%> shall be <S%H3045>known<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> not <S%H3117>day,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H3915>night:<s%> but it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that at <S%H6153>evening<s%> <S%H6256>time<s%> it shall be <S%H216>light.<s%>

And it shall be in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> that <S%H2416>living<s%> <S%H4325>waters<s%> shall <S%H3318>go<s%> out from <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> <S%H2677>half<s%> of them <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H6931>former<s%> <S%H3220>sea,<s%> and <S%H2677>half<s%> of them <S%H413>toward<s%> the <S%H314>hinder<s%> <S%H3220>sea:<s%> in <S%H7019>summer<s%> and in <S%H2778>winter<s%> shall it be.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H5921>over<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H776>earth:<s%> in that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall there be <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and his <S%H8034>name<s%> <S%H259>one.<s%>

<S%H3605>All<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> shall be <S%H5437>turned<s%> as a <S%H6160>plain<s%> from <S%H1387>Geba<s%> to <S%H7417>Rimmon<s%> <S%H5045>south<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem:<s%> and it shall be <S%H7213>lifted<s%> up, and <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> in her <S%H8478>place,<s%> from <S%H1144>Benjamin's<s%> <S%H8179>gate<s%> to the <S%H4725>place<s%> of the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H8179>gate,<s%> to the <S%H6434>corner<s%> <S%H8179>gate,<s%> and from the <S%H4026>tower<s%> of <S%H2606>Hananeel<s%> to the <S%H4428>king's<s%> <S%H3342>winepresses.<s%>

And men shall <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in it, and there shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> utter <S%H2764>destruction;<s%> but <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall be <S%H983>safely<s%> <S%H3427>inhabited.<s%>

And <S%H2063>this<s%> shall be the <S%H4046>plague<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H5062>smite<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5971>people<s%> that have <S%H6633>fought<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> Their <S%H1320>flesh<s%> shall <S%H4743>consume<s%> away while they <S%H5975>stand<s%> on their <S%H7272>feet,<s%> and their <S%H5869>eyes<s%> shall <S%H4743>consume<s%> away in their <S%H2356>holes,<s%> and their <S%H3956>tongue<s%> shall <S%H4743>consume<s%> away in their <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass in that <S%H3117>day,<s%> that a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H4103>tumult<s%> from the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> shall be among them; and they shall lay <S%H2388>hold<s%> <S%H376>every<s%> <S%H376>one<s%> on the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H7453>neighbor,<s%> and his <S%H3027>hand<s%> shall <S%H5927>rise<s%> up <S%H5921>against<s%> the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of his <S%H7453>neighbor.<s%>

And <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H1571>also<s%> shall <S%H3898>fight<s%> at <S%H3389>Jerusalem;<s%> and the <S%H2428>wealth<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> <S%H5439>round<s%> <S%H1157>about<s%> shall be <S%H622>gathered<s%> together, <S%H2091>gold,<s%> and <S%H3701>silver,<s%> and <S%H899>apparel,<s%> in <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H7230>abundance.<s%>

And <S%H3651>so<s%> shall be the <S%H4046>plague<s%> of the <S%H5483>horse,<s%> of the <S%H6505>mule,<s%> of the <S%H1581>camel,<s%> and of the <S%H2543>ass,<s%> and of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H929>beasts<s%> that shall be in <S%H1992>these<s%> <S%H4264>tents,<s%> as <S%H2063>this<s%> <S%H4046>plague.<s%>

And it shall <S%H1961>come<s%> to pass, that <S%H3605>every<s%> one that is <S%H3498>left<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1471>nations<s%> which <S%H935>came<s%> <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall even <S%H5927>go<s%> up from <S%H8141>year<s%> to <S%H8141>year<s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> the <S%H4428>King,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> and to <S%H2287>keep<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tabernacles.<s%>

And it shall be, that <S%H834>whoever<s%> will not <S%H5927>come<s%> up of all the <S%H4940>families<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> to <S%H7812>worship<s%> the <S%H4428>King,<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts,<s%> even on them shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4306>rain.<s%>

And if the <S%H4940>family<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> <S%H5927>go<s%> not up, and <S%H935>come<s%> not, that have <S%H3808>no<s%> rain; there shall be the <S%H4046>plague,<s%> with <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> will <S%H5062>smite<s%> the <S%H1471>heathen<s%> that <S%H5927>come<s%> not up to <S%H2287>keep<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tabernacles.<s%>

<S%H2063>This<s%> shall be the <S%H2403>punishment<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and the <S%H2403>punishment<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H5927>come<s%> not up to <S%H2287>keep<s%> the <S%H2282>feast<s%> of <S%H5521>tabernacles.<s%>

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall there be on the <S%H4698>bells<s%> of the <S%H5483>horses,<s%> <S%H6944>HOLINESS<s%> UNTO THE <S%H3068>LORD;<s%> and the <S%H5518>pots<s%> in the <S%H3068>LORD's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> shall be like the <S%H4219>bowls<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H4196>altar.<s%>

Yes, <S%H3605>every<s%> <S%H5518>pot<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and in <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall be <S%H6944>holiness<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts:<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> they that <S%H2076>sacrifice<s%> shall <S%H935>come<s%> and <S%H3947>take<s%> of them, and <S%H1310>seethe<s%> therein: and in that <S%H3117>day<s%> there shall be <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H5750>more<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> in the <S%H1004>house<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts.<s%>
